short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track commissions without leaving your inbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more switching tabs between Gmail and your commission software! With Everstage's Chrome Extension for Gmail, you can get crucial commission insights and sales performance metrics without ever leaving your inbox.

Benefits:

- Maximize Productivity: Save time and reduce friction by having all commission-related information within your inbox.

- Gain Commission Clarity: Track how much of your target you’ve hit and what you’re earning in real-time.

- Optimize your Sales Strategy: See your performance and commission forecasts for each deal as you interact with prospects.
